presentation.title: Summary
presentation.p1: I have studied Informatics Enginering, with a specialization in Software Enginering, and I am curently doing a UOC’s Master of Management and Development of WebSites and Web Applications. I have learned multiple programming languages, the most used methodologies and reusable programming methods.
presentation.p2: I have a strong passion for programming and keep learning. I have worked in Inversa Serveis Informàtics and in Deloite where I have cooperated with big working teams in international projects using agile methodology. I am always testing my knowledge with smal personal projects to keep learning new features.
presentation.p3: I have been working in an international Scrum project in Angular8 with microservices Java(Spring) hosted in AWS. Also performing QA tasks like Load&Performance tests with JMeter.
presentation.p4: I am a passionate, focused and perfectionist worker, and an easygoing and friendly coleague.
